Text: there is a small glitch in this skin when in skin modes 3 or 4 if you make the playlist wider the title label doesn't stretch all the way i may put out a fix

I've decided to put out a fixed version where i fixed some errors.  I would like to wait a couple of days so people could report any more glitches.....so if you find one leave a comment and i will try to fix it.
Also when i upload the fixed version i will try to leave a link on this torrent in the comments.
